name: Attack of the alien thingies from lava!
name_original: Attack of the alien thingies from lava!
description:
Try to survive the increasing waves of alien thingies! Unlock and upgrade guns, pickup power-ups, get Steam achievements. Have fun with this brainless shooter game!

Control: Keyboard and mouse.

Tips:
- you should visit often the circle at the center for useful gifts.
- first buy the revolver, it's unlocked from the first moment.
- weapon upgrades and ammos get more expensive from wave to wave so don't save golds.
- hedshot causes double damage
- their energy and power increasing from wave te wave, don't let them touch you at all!
